caption.p: Vaccination of MERS S nanoparticle plus Matrix M1 protects mice from MERS-CoV challenge. (A) neutralizing antibody levels against infections of live MERS-CoV. GMT ± standard deviation is graphed for each group of 10 mice. Dots represent individual mice. ∗ P<0.05, ∗∗∗ P<0.001, ns means not significant. (B) Lung MERS-CoV replication was determined by plaque assay. (C) MERS-CoV specific Leader mRNA expression (D) MERS-CoV genomic RNA expression. Mean ± standard deviation are graphed for each group of 10 mice. Dots represent individual mice. LOD means limit of detection. ∗∗∗ P<0.001. The figure was adapted with permission from Ref. 42.
